net.happybrackets.core.scheduling

Class DeviceSchedules

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.core.scheduling.DeviceSchedules

  • public class DeviceSchedules
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for containing inter-device scheduling
